title: NGINX_LOG_PARSE
KONG_LOG_PARSE
GEO_IP_LOOKUP
DRUID_ANAMOLY_PIPELINE
DROP_ALL_DEBUG_INFO_SERVICE_HEALTH_LOGS_CASE_SENSITIVE
source:
rule "DROP_ALL_DEBUG_INFO_SERVICE_HEALTH_LOGS_CASE_SENSITIVE"
when (contains(to_string($message.message), "DEBUG") 
OR contains(to_string($message.message), "INFO")
OR contains(to_string($message.message), "/service/health")
OR contains(to_string($message.message), "/health")
OR contains(to_string($message.message), "/metrics")
OR contains(to_string($message.message), "/status"))
then
drop_message();
end

title: ROUTE_TO_SYSLOG_STREAM
source:
rule "ROUTE_TO_SYSLOG_STREAM"
when (contains(to_string($message.log_file_path), "/var/log/syslog", true))
then
route_to_stream(name: "syslog", remove_from_default: true);
end

title: ROUTE_ALL_NON_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE_TO_DIFFERENT_STREAM
source:
rule "ROUTE_ALL_NON_APPLICATION_NAMESPACE_TO_DIFFERENT_STREAM"
when (contains(to_string($message.kubernetes_namespace), "monitoring", true))
OR (contains(to_string($message.kubernetes_namespace), "logging", true))
OR (contains(to_string($message.kubernetes_namespace), "kube-system", true))
then
route_to_stream(name: "Other Namespaces", remove_from_default: true);
end

title: SET_TIME_TO_NOW
source:
rule "SET_TIME_TO_NOW"
when has_field("message")
then
set_field("timestamp", now());
end
